channel.title: baseUrl on mannuan
channel.description: Recent content in baseUrl on mannuan

item.title: vue开发环境和生产环境自动切换baseUrl
item.description: 新建一个vue.config.js文件，填写下面的代码 const devBaseUrl = "/"; const proBaseUrl = "/knowledge-summary/frontend/dist/"; let baseUrl; process.env.NODE_ENV === "development" ? (baseUrl = devBaseUrl) : (baseUrl = proBaseUrl); module.exports = { baseUrl: baseUrl };
